description: Nato cites "proof beyond doubt" that Mr Navalny was poisoned, but Russia has dismissed the claim.
title: Alexei Navalny: Nato says Russia must disclose its Novichok programme
title_page: Alexei Navalny: Nato says Russia must disclose its Novichok programme - BBC News
maintext: "We strongly believe that this is a blatant violation of international law [banning the use of any chemical weapons], so it requires an international response, but I will not now speculate about exactly what kind of international response," he said.
